title: Educational Design for Strengthening Hospital Library Information Utilization Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Medical Terminology and Experience Using Library Search Systems
context.additional_context: Focuses on enhancing information retrieval skills for patient education, clinical support, and self-development by effectively utilizing hospital library resources

learning_goals: Learners can search for evidence-based resources to answer clinical questions with 80% accuracy using hospital library digital resources (medical databases, EBM tools)
Learners can select reliable medical information with 90% accuracy by applying information evaluation criteria (e.g., CRAAP Test)
Learners can create customized information guides for specific audiences (patients/medical staff) following instructional design principles (ADDIE model)
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
